containers.name: ibmcloud-object-storage-driver-test
command: version1=$(cat /home/s3-dep/version.txt | head -n 2 | tail -n 1); version2=$(/host/kubernetes/kubelet-plugins/volume/exec/ibm~ibmc-s3fs/ibmc-s3fs version); if [[ "$version1" == "$version2" ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi

version1=$(cat /home/s3-dep/version.txt | grep "^Version" ); version2=$(/host/kubernetes/kubelet-plugins/volume/exec/ibm~ibmc-s3fs/ibmc-s3fs version); if [[ "$version1" == "$version2" ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi

version1=$(cat /home/s3-dep/version.txt | grep "^Version" ); version2=$(/host/kubernetes/kubelet-plugins/volume/exec/ibm~ibmc-s3fs/ibmc-s3fs version); if [[ "$version1" == "$version2" ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi
